akn:section.akn:heading: Prospective payment of funds necessary to provide medical care

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In lieu of the reimbursement required under section 1085 of title 10, the Secretary of Homeland Security shall make a prospective payment to the Secretary of Defense of an amount that represents the actuarial valuation of treatment or care—
(b) The amount of the prospective payment under subsection (a) shall be—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: No Prospective Payment When Service in Navy.—

akn:content.akn:p: (c) No prospective payment shall be made under this section for any period during which the Coast Guard operates as a service in the Navy.
(d) This section shall not be construed to require a payment for, or the prospective payment of an amount that represents the value of, treatment or care provided under any TRICARE program.
